overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a strong social media presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, engaging with a total of 3,580 followers. His posts frequently focus on topics related to social media analysis, disinformation, and computational methods, achieving notable engagement through likes, reposts, and comments.

recommendations: Increase cross-promotion of content between platforms to boost visibility and follower growth.
Consider creating more interactive content, such as polls or Q&A sessions, to increase engagement rates.
